additional_info:
Urgently!!! Under sale 3 floor private house in Batumi, at the address: Al. Khalvashi ave. 157, on the highway to Khelvachauri (settlement of Mejinis Tskali). Distance till Ghonio 6 km, till Sarpi 13 km. House includes:  4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, billiard room,  fireplace, large hall, kitchen. Ground floor is equipped with metal-plastic framed windows and doors. 1-st and 2-d floors – with wooden framed doors and windows in good condition.  Inner walls are covered with wood and floors in all rooms are covered with parquet. House is in good condition, between floors there is inner wooden stairs.  House has 4 balconys, 2 garages with total area of 60 M2. Over the garages there are 2 summer verandas and mansard. Beyond the house is yard with total area of 1400 M2. On the territory of back yard there is living space of 60 M2 (3 rooms) ready to be rented out with new repairs and furniture. In the yard there are palm trees of various species.
Among communications house is furnished with: water, natural gas, electricity, sewage.
In the front yard of the house there functions fountain and decorated illuminations. There are as well  series of exotic plants.
House is registered in the Registry.
With real customers price can be negotiated.
